product_overview: A comprehensive Learning Management System (LMS) platform designed to provide an end-to-end online education experience for students, instructors, companies, and administrators. It features course catalog browsing, enrollment, interactive course delivery, corporate learning packages, and a robust admin backend for management and analytics.
core_goals: Deliver a seamless and engaging learning experience for students including interactive course content and progress tracking.
Enable instructors to effectively create, manage, and monetize their courses.
Provide companies with scalable corporate learning solutions including bulk enrollment and progress reporting.
Equip administrators with extensive platform management capabilities including user, course, bundle, payment, and content control.
Implement a secure, scalable, and modular backend architecture to ensure maintainability and future feature extensibility.
key_features: Homepage with featured courses, bundles, testimonials, blog highlights, and FAQ preview serving as the primary entry point.
Course Catalog with advanced filtering options and clear CTA buttons to discover individual courses and bundles.
Detailed Course Details page with intro video, syllabus, instructor bio, reviews, course-specific FAQs, and bundle integration.
Flexible Payment Page supporting single courses, bundles, and corporate bulk purchases with multiple payment methods and coupon support.
Student Dashboard providing personalized course overview, progress tracking, certificates access, and personalized recommendations.
Immersive Course Player featuring lessons, labs, assignments, quizzes, notes, student Q&A, reviews, and course FAQ sections.
Certificates section enabling viewing, downloading, and social sharing of earned certificates.
Bundles Catalog to showcase curated course bundles with dynamic discount rules and easy checkout.
Company Packages landing page and Company Dashboard for corporate clients with employee management, course assignment, and detailed analytics.
SEO-optimized Blog and comprehensive FAQ sections for community engagement and self-service support.
Instructor Dashboard to create and manage course content, monitor student activity, and respond to reviews.
Admin Dashboard with full control over users, courses, bundles, payments, content, and detailed analytics and reports.
user_flow_summary: Visitor enters Homepage, explores Featured Courses or Bundles, reads Blog Highlights, and accesses FAQs.
User browses Course Catalog using filters to find courses or bundles, then views Course Details.
From Course Details, user clicks 'Enroll Now' leading to the Payment Page to complete purchase.
On payment success, student is taken to their Student Dashboard showing enrolled courses and progress.
Students use Course Player to engage with course materials and complete lessons, labs, assignments, quizzes, unlocking certificates upon completion.
Instructors log in, manage their courses via the Instructor Dashboard, upload content, and interact with students.
Company admins log in to the Company Dashboard to bulk enroll employees, assign courses/bundles, and monitor progress.
Admins operate through the Admin Dashboard to manage all platform entities, approve courses, define bundles and pricing, and generate analytics reports.
validation_criteria: All course content types (video, PDFs, quizzes, assignments) must load correctly and be fully functional in the Course Player.
Payment gateway integrations (Stripe, PayPal) must securely process single, bundle, and corporate payments with proper application of discounts and coupons.
Role-based access control must correctly restrict dashboard capabilities to students, instructors, company admins, and super admins.
Course approval workflows for admins must allow review, approval, rejection, and deletion of courses.
Analytics and reporting components must accurately aggregate data including revenue, user growth, course performance, and employee learning statistics.
Bulk company enrollments and progress tracking must reflect correctly in Company Dashboards.
UI must adhere to accessibility standards and be fully responsive on desktop and mobile devices.
FAQs, Blog posts, and reviews must be manageable by admin interfaces and appear correctly across the platform.
Certificates must be generated automatically upon course completion, and support PDF download and LinkedIn/social sharing integration.
